alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:01PM EDT until July 02 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PERRY...SOUTHEASTERN HANCOCK...WEST CENTRAL BRECKINRIDGE AND NORTHERN OHIO COUNTIES... At 100 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hawesville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cannelton, Cloverport, Skillman, Deanefield, Dodd, Victoria Crossroads, Tobinsport, Sunny Corner, Lauer and Tar Fork. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
